name: CODEX Compress
description: Archival preparation tool for floppy-grade distribution. Text compression, HTML content extraction, manifest generation, and disk allocation.
features: TEXT: Normalize whitespace, collapse blank lines, calculate floppy grade
URL: Extract essential content from HTML, strip boilerplate
MANIFEST: Generate manifest.txt with file listing and checksums
SIZE: Calculate optimal disk distribution (first-fit decreasing)
author: CODEX System
